message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with improving document ranking, which is a core problem in information retrieval (cs.IR). The approach involves utilizing language models induced from clusters, which falls under natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of bipartite graphs and centrality measures is a common technique in graph theory and network analysis (cs.DS), while the comparison of different ranking algorithms involves machine learning and optimization (cs.LG). Finally, the use of clusters to identify relevant documents is a common theme in information retrieval and text mining (cs.AI).
